languages.text: "Один раз я видел подобную планету в огне. Ксар-Мага, санкционированный Экстерминатус, зажигательные циклонные торпеды. Мир пылал несколько месяцев, пока не выгорел дотла".

traits.locale_text: "Один раз я видел подобную планету в огне. Ксар-Мага, санкционированный Экстерминатус, зажигательные циклонные торпеды. Мир пылал несколько месяцев, пока не выгорел дотла".

languages.text: "I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash."
languages.original_text: "Один раз я видел подобную планету в огне. Ксар-Мага, санкционированный Экстерминатус, зажигательные циклонные торпеды. Мир пылал несколько месяцев, пока не выгорел дотла".

traits.locale_text: "I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash.
"I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash.
"I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash.
"I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash."

languages.text: « Je n'avais vu qu'une seule planète brûler à ce jour : Ksar-Maga. L'Exterminatus avait été invoqué et des torpilles cycloniques avaient été lancées. Le monde a brûlé des mois durant, jusqu'à ce que tout soit réduit en cendres à sa surface. »
languages.original_text: "I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'avais vu qu'une seule planète brûler à ce jour : Ksar-Maga. L'Exterminatus avait été invoqué et des torpilles cycloniques avaient été lancées. Le monde a brûlé des mois durant, jusqu'à ce que tout soit réduit en cendres à sa surface. »

languages.text: “我之前见过另一颗行星熊熊燃烧，是克萨米加。当时他们发出了灭绝令，动用了旋风鱼雷。大火烧了好几个月，直到整个世界化为灰烬。”
languages.original_text: "I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash."

traits.locale_text: “我之前见过另一颗行星熊熊燃烧，是克萨米加。当时他们发出了灭绝令，动用了旋风鱼雷。大火烧了好几个月，直到整个世界化为灰烬。”

languages.text: 「以前、カサール・マガという惑星が燃えるのを見たことがある。〈究極浄化〉（エクステルミナートゥス）が発動され、焼夷サイクロン・トルピードが配備された。世界は数カ月燃え続け、灰だけになった」
languages.original_text: "I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash."

traits.locale_text: 「以前、カサール・マガという惑星が燃えるのを見たことがある。〈究極浄化〉（エクステルミナートゥス）が発動され、焼夷サイクロン・トルピードが配備された。世界は数カ月燃え続け、灰だけになった」

languages.text: "Ich habe schon einmal einen Planeten brennen sehen — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus wurde angerufen, Zyklonentorpedos mit Brandsatz wurden eingesetzt. Die Welt brannte monatelang, bis nur noch Asche übrig war."
languages.original_text: "I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe schon einmal einen Planeten brennen sehen — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus wurde angerufen, Zyklonentorpedos mit Brandsatz wurden eingesetzt. Die Welt brannte monatelang, bis nur noch Asche übrig war.

languages.text: «Había visto un planeta arder una vez: Ksar-Maga. Se ordenó el Exterminatus y se dispararon torpedos ciclónicos incendiarios. El planeta ardió durante meses hasta que solo quedaron cenizas».
languages.original_text: "I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash."

traits.locale_text: «Había visto un planeta arder una vez: Ksar-Maga. Se ordenó el Exterminatus y se dispararon torpedos ciclónicos incendiarios. El planeta ardió durante meses hasta que solo quedaron cenizas.

languages.text: "Bir keresinde bir gezegenin, Ksar-Maga'nın yandığını görmüştüm. Eksterminatus çağrılmış, yakıcı siklonik torpidolar konuşlandırılmıştı. Dünya birkaç ay boyunca yanmış, geriye sadece küller kalmıştı."
languages.original_text: "I have seen a planet burn once before — Ksar-Maga. Exterminatus was invoked, incendiary cyclonic torpedoes were deployed. The world burned for several months until there was nothing but ash."
